title.rendered: Job At Balochistan Wheels Limited In Karachi In August 2024

content.rendered:
Job At Balochistan Wheels Limited In Karachi In August 2024. Balochistan Wheels Limited, a leading automotive company in Karachi, is looking for talented candidates. Various divisions within the company offer career opportunities, including management, operations, marketing, and sales.

By 26 Oct 2024, interested candidates should send their resumes and cover letters to [email protected]. Candidates who have been shortlisted for further evaluation will be contacted. We offer salaries ranging from 17000 rupees per month to 35000 rupees per month.

Contact Us to Publish Your Jobs Ads At statesaga.com

Baluchistan Wheels Limited Management Jobs in Karachi 2024

Date Posted: 10 August, 2024
Last Date: 26 Oct, 2024
Category: Private
Newspaper: Nation Jobs
Education: Bachelor, Master, MS, BS
Location: Karachi, Pakistan
Organization: Balochistan Wheels Limited
Job Industry: Management Jobs
Job Type: Full Time

Latest Job In August 2024

  • Islamabad Exim Bank Job in 2024
  • NASTP Jobs in Islamabad, 2024
  • Job at Peshawar Services Club in August 2024

The advertisement published in the Daily Nation Newspaper on August 10, 2024 invites applications from qualified candidates for the post of transfer agent and registrar at Baluchistan Wheels Limited Karachi, Pakistan. The position is suitable for candidates with a Master’s Degree, a Master’s Degree combined with a Bachelor’s Degree, etc. Candidates with education backgrounds will be preferred.

It is advised that interested candidates apply for the latest Baluchistan Wheels Limited private jobs in Management and other departments before the closing date, which is around Oct 26, 2024, or according to the newspaper advertisement. Learn more about the various job opportunities available at Baluchistan Wheels Limited by reading the entire ad.

BWL’s application process for management jobs

Follow the application process for management jobs at BWL, from submission requirements to selection procedures. Make your skills, experiences, and enthusiasm stand out as a top candidate by learning how to showcase them effectively.
